log.title: Boutique Advantage Strategy Implementation
log.description: Complete strategic shift from competing on review volume to winning on expertise. Created GBP Agent and Proactive SEO Agent.
changes: Created /api/gbp-agent with 8 actions for GBP optimization (32% of local ranking)
Created /api/proactive-seo-agent to lead from the front
Reframed flywheel from review-count comparison to boutique positioning
Added GBP tracking to INGEST phase
Added GBP gap analysis to ANALYZE phase
Added long-tail keyword targets (color correction specialist, grey blending expert)
Added E-E-A-T credential section highlighting 5 brand certifications
Added Boutique Advantage Reminder to every flywheel run

expectedImpact.longTailRankings: Top 5 for niche keywords within 60 days

log.title: Quick Service Navigation Bar
log.description: Added quick service links below hero section to reduce bounce rate by giving visitors immediate navigation options.
changes: Added 6 service quick links: Balayage, Color Correction, Extensions, Highlights, Keratin, Wedding Hair
Implemented as responsive flex container with hover effects

log.title: Directory Submission Automation Toolkit

Added business-config.js with verified NAP data
Added auto-submit.js for Playwright automation
Added browser-agent.py for AI browser control

log.title: Self-Learning SEO System (RuVector)

changes: Created seo-knowledge-graph.js for tracking patterns
Created learning-agent.js for AI recommendations
Created data-ingestion.js for API data pipeline
Created weekly-learning-cycle.js for automated optimization
Created seo-learning admin dashboard
